org.eclipse.graphiti.ui.internal.util.ui.print

Class AbstractFigureSelectionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jface.window.Window
      • org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog
        • org.eclipse.graphiti.ui.internal.util.ui.print.AbstractFigureSelectionDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.jface.window.IShellProvider, org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExportDiagramDialog, PrintFigureDialog

    public class AbstractFigureSelectionDialog
extends org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog
implements org.eclipse.swt.events.SelectionListener
    This is an abstract dialog, where the user can choose between the whole figure or a selection.
